revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #13 Peragu (Wepear) |image = [[File:Wepear.png]] |caption = Brota de una flor blanca muy bonita. Tiene un punto ácido y amargo al mismo tiempo, y ayuda a la digestión. |growtime = 6m 40s |harvest = 12 bayas |replant = 40% |mutation = 1.6% |points = 30 |flavor =
*0 picante *0 seco *0 dulce *10 amargo *10 ácido }} '''Peragu (Wepear)''' es un tipo de [[Berries|baya]] que puede ser plantada en la [[Farm|granja]]. Se puede obtener rodeando una parcela vacía con al menos 1 baya [[Rawst|Safre (Rawst)]] y al menos 1 baya [[Oran|Aranja (Oran)]]. == Tablas de Crecimiento == === Estados de Crecimiento === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" |+ Estados de Crecimiento ! !! Brote !! Crecimiento !! Floración !! Madurez |- ! Tiempo pasado desde que se planta | 2 mins 30 seg || 5 mins 50 seg || 6 mins 15 seg || 6 mins 40 seg - 13 mins 20 seg |- ! Animación |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:WepearTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:WepearTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:WepearTreeBerry.png|50px]] |}
=== Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time |- ! None | 6 mins 40 secs -
13 mins 20 secs |- ! Sprayduck | 4 mins 27 secs -
8 mins 53 secs |}
== Flow Chart == [[File:Wepear_Flow_Chart.png|200px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations ===
You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Wepear berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Oran.png|30px]] [[Oran]] |}
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Optimized Planting Formation |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Oran.png|30px]] [[Oran]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Oran.png|30px]]
[[Oran]] |- style="height: 50px;" | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Oran.png|30px]] [[Oran]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Oran.png|30px]]
[[Oran]] |}
=== Timing Table === {| class="collapsible wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch or Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Oran]] || - || - || - |- | [[Rawst]] || 1 min 20 secs until ripe || 53 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- |}
==Acquisition== ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Berries}} {{LootItem|Berry Forest|Epic}} {{LootItem|Radio Tower|Epic}} {{LootItem|Floccesy Ranch|Epic}} {{LootItem|Connecting Cave|Common}} |} |}

{{Infobox Berry |name = #13 Peragu (Wepear) |image = [[File:Wepear.png]] |caption = Brota de una flor blanca muy bonita. Tiene un punto ácido y amargo al mismo tiempo, y ayuda a la digestión. |growtime = 6m 40s |harvest = 12 bayas |replant = 40% |mutation = 1.6% |points = 30 |flavor =
*0 picante *0 seco *0 dulce *10 amargo *10 ácido }}
'''Wepear''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Rawst]] and at least 1 [[Oran]].
== Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 2 mins 30 secs || 5 mins 50 secs || 6 mins 15 secs || 6 mins 40 secs - 13 mins 20 secs |- ! Animation |

[[File:WepearTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:WepearTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:WepearTreeBerry.png|50px]] |}

13 mins 20 secs |- ! Sprayduck | 4 mins 27 secs -
8 mins 53 secs |}
== Flow Chart == [[File:Wepear_Flow_Chart.png|200px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations ===
